org.jsfml.graphics

Class Sprite

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jsfml.internal.SFMLNativeObject
      • org.jsfml.graphics.Sprite
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Drawable, Transformable

    public class Sprite
extends SFMLNativeObject
implements Drawable
    Represents a drawable instance of a texture or texture portion.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Sprite()
      Constructs a new sprite without a texture.
      Sprite(ConstTexture texture)
      Constructs a new sprite with the specified texture.
      Sprite(ConstTexture texture, IntRect rect)
      Constructs a new sprite with the specified texture and texture portion.

      • setTexture

        public void setTexture(ConstTexture texture,
              boolean resetRect)
        Sets the texture of this sprite.
        Parameters:
        texture - the new texture.
        resetRect - true to reset the texture rectangle, false otherwise.

      • setTexture

        public final void setTexture(ConstTexture texture)
        Sets the texture of this sprite without affecting the texture rectangle.
        Parameters:
        texture - the new texture.

      • setTextureRect

        public void setTextureRect(IntRect rect)
        Sets the portion of the texture that will be used for drawing.

        An empty rectangle can be passed to indicate that the whole texture shall be used.

        The width and / or height of the rectangle may be negative to indicate that the respective axis should be flipped. For example, a width of -32 will result in a sprite that is 32 pixels wide and flipped horizontally.

        Parameters:
        rect - the texture portion.

      • setColor
